en: In response to a source quoted today (August 7) as someone saying that the Director of Public Prosecutions (DPP) has proposed to establish a so-called "independent prosecution committee", the Secretary for Justice and the DPP confirm that the report is totally unfounded and they are deeply disappointed over it.
zh: 就今日（八月七日）有人引述消息，指刑事檢控專員曾建議成立一個所謂「獨立檢控委員會」一事，律政司司長和刑事檢控專員澄清有關說法並沒有事實根據，對此表示非常遺憾。
